pgTitle: List of accolades received by The Last of Us
tableCaption: '''List of accolades received by ''The Last of Us'''''

headers.text: {{multiple image |image1=Bruce Straley PAX Prime 2014.jpg |width1=145 |alt1= A 35-year-old man with short brown hair, smiling and looking at something to the right of the camera. |image2=Neil Druckmann SDCC 2014.jpg |width2=150 |alt2= A 35-year-old man with curly black hair talking into a microphone, looking at something to the left of the camera.|background color=;border:none; }} Game director Bruce Straley (left) and creative director Neil Druckmann (right) were awarded for their work on the game.

{{multiple image |image1=Bruce Straley PAX Prime 2014.jpg |width1=145 |alt1= A 35-year-old man with short brown hair, smiling and looking at something to the right of the camera. |image2=Neil Druckmann SDCC 2014.jpg |width2=150 |alt2= A 35-year-old man with curly black hair talking into a microphone, looking at something to the left of the camera.|background color=;border:none; }} Game director Bruce Straley (left) and creative director Neil Druckmann (right) were awarded for their work on the game.

{{multiple image |image1=Bruce Straley PAX Prime 2014.jpg |width1=145 |alt1= A 35-year-old man with short brown hair, smiling and looking at something to the right of the camera. |image2=Neil Druckmann SDCC 2014.jpg |width2=150 |alt2= A 35-year-old man with curly black hair talking into a microphone, looking at something to the left of the camera.|background color=;border:none; }} Game director Bruce Straley (left) and creative director Neil Druckmann (right) were awarded for their work on the game.
